Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to establishing an accidental disability retirement pension for deputy sheriffs employed by Nassau county
Summary: Relates to establishing an accidental disability retirement pension for deputy sheriffs employed by Nassau county; provides that a deputy sheriff employed by Nassau county shall receive a pension of three-quarters of his or her final average salary.
LawCode: Amd ยง556, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to establishing an accidental disability retirement pension for deputy sheriffs employed by Nassau County
